source_objects.description: Take your management skills to the next level with these course in negotiation, leadership, people management and more.
source_objects.title: Management

items.title: AI for CEOs
items.headline: Why AI will create exceptional value in your business, if you let it do so.
objectives_summary: How to get your business ready for the Age of AI
Get an understanding of the business implications of AI in your company
Know the best ways to use AI in your business operations

items.title: Software Product Leadership - Product Management 101

visible_instructors.name: Dean
visible_instructors.job_title: Former Director of PM at Microsoft Research
visible_instructors.title: Dean Slawson

items.headline: Take your first step towards a higher paying Product Management job!
objectives_summary: Role of a Software Product Manager
Writing Functional Specs (Spec templates included)
Using User Stories to make informed decisions

items.title: Management Principles

visible_instructors.name: Daniel
visible_instructors.job_title: Ex-CEO offers Marketing Course for small and large business
visible_instructors.title: Daniel McCarty

items.headline: This course will introduce you to basic management theory:  planning, organizing, leading and control.
objectives_summary: Course Goal:  By the end of this course students will be able to practice profession management techniques in either a corporate or entrepreneurial setting.
Course objectives:  Teach students to use the basic management functions to run any type of business.  The functions are planning, organizing, leading and control.

items.title: Six Sigma Green Belt Certification (with analysis in excel)

visible_instructors.name: Govind
visible_instructors.title: Govind Kumar
visible_instructors.job_title: Artificial Intelligence and Business Transformation Expert

visible_instructors.display_name: Sai Acuity Institute of Learning Pvt Ltd Enabling Learning Through Insight!
visible_instructors.name: Sai Acuity Institute of Learning Pvt Ltd
visible_instructors.title: Sai Acuity Institute of Learning Pvt Ltd Enabling Learning Through Insight!
visible_instructors.job_title: Cybersecurity, Data Science & Human Capital Practitioners!

items.headline: Learn to apply & Grow in your career! Practical explanation of concepts with examples and case study
objectives_summary: You will be able to prepare for Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification
You will be competent to solve real life business & home related problems using Lean Six Sigma Techniques
You will learn strategies to cut costs and improve productivity

items.title: How to have better company meetings
items.headline: Have fewer meetings, get better results with an agenda, a plan, and good communication
objectives_summary: The system you need to run excellent company meetings
How better meetings means happier employees
How to have fewer meetings, with better results

items.title: Oxford Diploma in (Pre-University) Business Fundamentals
items.headline: Oxford Diploma in Business Fundamentals (+ Multiple choice tests and workbooks)
objectives_summary: 1. Business principles to enable passing College business exams
2. Practical and theoretical aspects of business
3. Functions of key departments

items.title: Small Business Management and Marketing Essentials
items.headline: Evaluate yourself, your team and buisness performance. Get the skills to become organized and help your company improve
objectives_summary: Develop control points and reports to evaluate their business performance.
Gather ideas to implement them.
Establish business controls with or without software (all examples in the course are made with excel to simplify the process). (Create reports, establish controls, etc.)

items.title: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt for IT Professionals

visible_instructors.name: Koundinya
visible_instructors.job_title: Expert trainer for Lean | Lean Six Sigma | Creative Thinking
visible_instructors.title: Koundinya Nemana (Edushore)

items.headline: Black Belt certification course exclusively designed for professionals who are working in IT and Technology companies!
objectives_summary: Simplified explanations of all the concepts of Lean Six Sigma Black Belt with practical examples and exercises designed exclusively for IT industry scenarios.
Multiple exercises (with key) for each module with detailed (step by step) instructions. All you need is MS Excel for these exercises and you can download these exercise files.
A real case study of how a Lean Six Sigma Black Belt project is driven to improve an IT industry process.

items.title: Mastering ISO/IEC 17025: 2017 and Certified Internal Auditor

visible_instructors.name: Subhasis
visible_instructors.title: Subhasis Mallik
visible_instructors.job_title: Trainer in Lab Accreditation and IATF 16949 field.

items.headline: Detailed understanding of ISO/IEC 17025-2017 standard and that for conducting an effective internal audit.
objectives_summary: Detailed understanding of the clauses of ISO/IEC 17025 - 2017 standard.
How to implement ISO/IEC 17025 requirements in a test or calibration laboratory.
Skill for auditing laboratory activities for ISO/IEC 17025 - 2017.

items.title: Process Leader Framework

visible_instructors.name: Janne
visible_instructors.job_title: Customer Experience Trainer, Coach, Mentor and Leader
visible_instructors.title: Janne Ohtonen, PhD

items.headline: The Secret for Becoming a Winner With Customer-Centric Process Leadership!
objectives_summary: Fresh ideas on how to manage your business processes from customer centric perspective.
Learn new leadership skills and revisit existing ones from different perspectives to become more influential leader.
Get practical advice for every week of the year and challenge your thinking with reflective and challenging questions.

items.title: Systems Innovation
items.headline: Learn systems innovation - the new systems-based approach to enabling transformative change within complex organizations
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will have gained a solid grasp of the central concepts in the area of systems change and how to apply them

items.title: Effectively Dealing with Difficult People

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course teaches practical, everyday skills in dealing with difficult people.
objectives_summary: Identify characteristics of difficult people.
Recognize certain personality or emotional traits associated with “difficult people".
Explore the rationale behind the behavior of difficult people.

items.title: MYOB AccountRight Essential Training
items.headline: Learn How to Use MYOB AccountRight Software To Effectively Manage Your Daily Business Operations
objectives_summary: Installing MYOB AccountRight Software Free Trial
Creating Your Company Files
Customizing MYOB Preferences

items.title: Level 4 Diploma - Commercial Negotiation (L4M5)
items.headline: Practice Test for L4M5 - a module of CIPS Level 4 Diploma in Procurement and Supply with answer and detailed explanation
objectives_summary: Learning Outcome 1: Understand key approaches in the negotiation of commercial agreements with external organisation
Learning Outcome 2: Know how to prepare for negotiations with external organisations
Learning Outcome 3: Understand how commercial negotiations should be undertaken

items.title: Virtual Teams: Remote Team Management & Leadership
items.headline: Managing a remote team as a leader. Virtual team management & motivation
objectives_summary: Practical tools and techniques for managing a remote team
How to delegate effectively
Tools to help you motivate different personality types

items.title: Foundation Certificate in Business Analysis (ISEB) exams

visible_instructors.name: Brandi
visible_instructors.job_title: Business Consulting, Solution Architecture, Integration of c
visible_instructors.title: Brandi Chastain

items.headline: Pass the certification on the first attempt. 175 questions
objectives_summary: Recognise the skills and competencies required of the business analyst describe how a business strategy is developed
Adopt a business analysis process modal approach to change initiatives capture business system issues
Consider the perspectives of key individuals who will be affected or are interested in the change project and document their views
